comments.body: Documentation only states that `"ascii" | "base64" | "utf8"` are allowed. Could you please point to where the other values are permitted?

Hi @armanio123 

encoding setting is used here:

```
		readStream = this._readStream ? this._readStream :
			fs.createReadStream(this._filepath, this._streamOptions);
```

[fs.createReadStream documentation states](https://nodejs.org/api/fs.html#fs_fs_createreadstream_path_options): "The encoding can be any one of those accepted by Buffer.", which in turn are [all the ones listed in this PR](https://nodejs.org/api/buffer.html#buffer_buffers_and_character_encodings).
